title: Need clear overview of today's deadlines
evidence: Participant C Q1,Q3; Participant A Q3
notes: Students fear they might miss a deadline when they are away from the desk; current task list does not highlight what is due today or soon.

title: No clear confirmation after add/edit/delete
evidence: Participant A earlier notes; Participant B Q2; Lab1 no-JS PRG path
notes: HTMX path already updates a live region, but the no-JS POST-Redirect-GET path does not show an explicit success or error message; users may refresh the page to check.

title: Keyboard focus and controls may skip important buttons
evidence: Participant A Q4; Participant B Q4; Participant C Q4
notes: Need to verify that all controls in the task manager (add, delete, future edit) are reachable in a sensible order using Tab/Shift+Tab/Enter/Space only.

title: Text and spacing are hard to read when eyes are tired
evidence: Participant B Q5; Participant A Q5; Participant C Q5
notes: Risk that default styles (line-height, contrast) may not be sufficient for long lists of tasks under poor lighting or tired eyes; needs check against WCAG 1.4.3.

title: Tool does not help prioritise or safely drop low-impact tasks
evidence: Participant A Q6; Participant B Q6; Participant C Q6
notes: Nice-to-have: a future feature that shows which tasks are critical vs. low-impact to reduce anxiety; out of scope for Week 6/7 implementation.

title: Tasks scattered across many channels
evidence: Participant C Q2; Participant B Q2
notes: Core pain point for students but requires integration with other systems (Minerva, email etc.); note it as a design driver rather than something we implement now.

title: Error messages for invalid input may not persist in no-JS mode
notes: If the title is blank, the HTMX path can return an inline error with aria-live, but the no-JS redirect may lose the error context; we should plan an error summary on the GET /tasks page.

title: Live region behaviour and skip link need SR verification
notes: We added a skip link and a status live region, but so far have mainly tested with keyboard and DevTools; need explicit NVDA/VoiceOver checks in later weeks.

title: Priority field has no visible label
evidence: Optional `priority` input uses placeholder only, no `<label>`.
notes: Add visible `<label for=\priority\">Priority (optional)</label>` and give the input `id=\"priority\"`."

title: Task list icon image has no alt
Focus outline is too subtle
